entry.title: Bromelain Capsules (Strength 2400) - everyday strength
entry.summary:
Vendor: Enzyme Technologies
Type: Supplements
Price: 194.00

Enzyme Technologies' Bromelain Capsules (60 vegan capsules) 2400 Strength is quality, non-toxic and safe for everyday consumption!

  • A very good digestive aid and de-wormer, and known to treat stomach ulcers
  • Anti-inflammatory (reduces pain and inflammation related to arthritis, surgery and injury)
  • Effective antibiotic and antiviral
  • Improves immune functioning and speeds up healing processes
  • Anti-coagulant (reduces the risk of heart disease and strokes)
  • Anti-cancer properties
  • A proudly South African product manufactured in South Africa using locally sourced pineapples
  • Suitable for Vegans and Vegetarians
  • Dairy free, nut-free, gluten-free. 

    Ingredients

    Bromelain (Pineapple enzyme), L-Cystein (plant based), Maltodextrine, Vegan cellulose capsules

    How to use

    Take with meals to support gut health | Take between meals to reduce inflammation, pain and thin blood | 2-3 capsules daily

entry.title: Bromelain Capsules (Strength 4000) - therapeutic strength

Type: Supplements
Price: 222.00

  • Improves immune functioning and speeds up healing processes
